detail_desc: Long-sleeved knitted jumper in a soft viscose blend with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-style top in jersey crêpe with a gathered stand-up collar and small opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long, slightly wider, cuffed sleeves.
Cargo trousers in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and tapered legs. Patch side pockets, fake back pockets, and flap leg pockets.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Short-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton jersey.
Long, straight-cut shirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pockets with a pleat, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Studio Collection. Bold, eccentric blouse in pleated organza with a gathered, flared stand-up collar and narrow ties at the front. Deep V-neck surrounded by a gathered frill and cut-out chest section. Large, smooth flounces at the front, back and around the armholes create a full silhouette with defined shoulders. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Sleeveless dress woven in a checked wool blend with adjustable, elasticated shoulder straps, a V-neck and shaped cups. Concealed zip at the back, and a slit front and back. Lined.
Cotton jersey vest top with a print motif on the front.
Short-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and chest pocket with an appliqué. Gathered, elasticated seam at the hips and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Half-shaft wellingtons with a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with a fold-down edge at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with a seam and flared cuffs with a slit.
Running cap in woven fabric with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the back and a contrasting colour mesh lining.

Shirt in patterned premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.

Short dress in an airy weave with embroidery at the front, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with a button and flounced trim at the cuffs. Concealed zip in one side and a gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping.
Round-necked playsuit in pleated jersey with a sheen. Raglan butterfly sleeves, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and raw edges at the sleeves and hem.
Classic T-shirt in soft, gently draping jersey made from a cotton and silk blend. Straight cut with short sleeves.
Slip-on trainers with fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Small shoulder bag in sturdy imitation leather with a flap and magnetic fastener. Narrow metal chain and imitation leather shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 7.5x15.5x17.5 cm.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.
Long nightshirt in soft cotton flannel with notch lapels, a chest pocket, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Long-sleeved satin shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. Wide elastication and gathers around the top and long sleeves with frilled cuffs.
3/4-length leggings in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Pyjama shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, sewn-on bow at the front and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and a chest pocket.
Pull-on shorts in stretch cotton twill with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly and fake front pockets.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short puff sleeves with smocked trims and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in a brocade weave containing glittery threads with a concealed zip at the back. Gathered seam at the waist, a very wide skirt and an underskirt in a double layer of tulle. Lined.

Set with a T-shirt and skirt in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a motif on the front and round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim. Skirt with an all-over print, elastication and a frill trim at the waist, and a decorative bow at the front. Unlined.
Treggings in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs.
Short skirt in a patterned crêpe weave with buttons down the front. Unlined.
Suede shoulder bag with a metal-chain strap, metal decoration, magnetic fastener and one zipped inner pocket. Cotton lining. Size 4.5x15x21 cm.
Long-sleeved jersey top in a viscose blend with a round neckline, slightly deeper neckline and the back and a decorative strap at the back of the neck.
Derby shoes in imitation patent leather with lacing at the front and chunky platform soles. Jersey linings and insoles. Height of soles 5.5 cm.
Short, thin metal chain necklace with leaf-shaped pendants. Adjustable length, 40-48 cm.
Leather loafers with tassels, a moccasin seam at the front and soft heels that can be folded down. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short shirt dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Smocked seam under the bust and long sleeves with a tab and button. Unlined.

Blouse in a slub-weave viscose blend containing some linen. Square neckline, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders. Gently shaping seams front and back and a seam at the waist.
Short, double-breasted coat in woven fabric with notch lapels,buttons at the front and patch front pockets.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Trousers in a patterned viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Fitted, long-sleeved nursing dress in organic cotton jersey with a V-neck and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Long skirt in a patterned silk weave with a concealed zip at the back and flare to the hem. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. No buttons.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with a V-neck and foldover edge with a button at the top. Buttons down the front and at the cuffs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. One dress is patterned.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
A-line skirt in slightly stretchy denim with side pockets and metal buttons down the front.
Scarf in a patterned weave with fringes.
Cold shoulder dress in sturdy jersey with a flounce at the top, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Ankle-length, tailored trousers in woven fabric with a hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases. Slits at the hems.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.

Lace push-up body with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, and a string at the back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey.
Trainers with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Sleeveless dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft jersey with long sleeves, and press-studs down the front and along one leg. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Fully lined swimsuit with a high cut at the neckline, tapered waist and wide shoulder straps at the back.

prod_name: TP BOSSE fancy OH hood SB
detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
All-in-one suit in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and a back pocket.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with an overlocked frill trim at the top and narrow ties at the sides. Low waist.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with embroidery. V-neck opening at the top with tasselled ties, and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with a slit and tasselled ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Blouse in airy silk chiffon with decorative seams at the front. Small stand-up collar, buttons down the front, extra-long sleeves, wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a high slit at the back.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Joggers in soft organic cotton jersey with a frill-trimmed, elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch. Pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in satin. Shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, front pockets and long sleeves with narrow cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Short, flared skirt in plumeti chiffon with a jersey lining. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim.
